metadata.title: CVE-2016-10206 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 andearlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of users forrequests that change passwords and possibly have unspecified other impactas demonstrated by a crafted user action request to index.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-10206` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zoneminder - 1.30.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.30.4+dfsg-1').
